item.title: [PI] ::players command
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

Whenever a player types ::players it gives a number of players on. On a few servers, I’ve seen that ::players sometimes shows a list of players on. I’d like to do that. Anyone got a command for that for project insanity base?

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) { c.sendMessage("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " players online."); }
that’s my current ::players command.

Read full topic
